@author Yoni Svechinsky

devdoc.author: Yoni Svechinsky

getReturn(address,uint256,address).details: Returns worst case amount for conversion

tradeExactly(address,uint256,address,uin.details: Trades from src to dest returning sending at most maxDestAmount to recepient and returnin the rest to the sender

params.maxDestAmount: Maximum amount of dest tokens to convert to
params.recepient: Address to send dest tokens to

tradeExactly(address,uint256,address,uin.return: A tuple of the converted amount and remainder

devdoc.title: Exchange interface that must be implemented by any exchange used. Either directly or through a intermediary contract
